<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="">[Corpse Tender](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=196)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

**Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 81

You tend to [mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160), such as the [zombie](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=103) farmhands and farm animals throughout Geb.

</column>
